Title: Authorizes actions and proceedings by unit owners against a condominium board of managers for certain violations of law or of resolutions adopted by such board of managers
Summary: Authorizes actions and proceedings by unit owners against a condominium board of managers for certain violations of law or of resolutions adopted by such board of managers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to authorizing actions and proceedings by unit owners against a condominium board of managers for certain violations of law or of resolutions adopted by such board of managers
